Articles.Content:
A new enterprise, **Potato Science**, started research of new thrusters powered by *electric charge* and *xenon gas*.

The first prototype are designed to be a public preview.

This model provide the best thrust/fuel ratio actually on the market. Requires electric charge and xenon gas to work, but is really cheaper than a normal engine.

This mod is actually in **beta** stage, we must change textures and add fix other things.

![635673476627668455.png](http://media-elerium.cursecdn.com/avatars/18/46/635673476627668455.png)

*License: All Right reserved*

***DOWNLOAD HERE***[**http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/230555-electric-thrust-engine-ete/files/latest**](http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/230555-electric-thrust-engine-ete/files/latest)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-16T16:31:05Z" title="05/16/2015 04:31  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 16, 2015</time> by JarDev**

> 
> A new enterprise, **Potato Science**, started research of new thrusters powered by *electric charge* and *xenon gas*.
> The first prototype are designed to be a public preview.
> 
> This model provide the best thrust/fuel ratio actually on the market. Requires electric charge and xenon gas to work, but is really cheaper than a normal engine.
> 
> This mod is actually in **beta** stage, we must change textures and add fix other things.

I love add a bit of "story" behind my mods ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
isnt this the way ion engines already work?

Yes, i've added other two engines, more powerful.
